page.title: 15LOCAL MEDIA IN BRYNNA
page.content: THE LOCAL MEDIA CONSISTS OF:_LOCAL NEWSPAPERS WESTEN MAIL,ECHO,GLAMORGAN GAZETTE,GLAMORGAN STAR AND THE LLANTRISANT OBSERVER.THEY ARE ALL PUBLISHED IN BRIDGEND + CARDIFF WHICH ARE 6 AND 18 MILES AWAY FROM OUR AREA. TELEVISION:TWO CHANNELS WHICH COVER WALES ARE S.4.C AND H.T.V.THEIR IS ALSO A DIARY IN THE AREA IT IS CALLED THE BRYNNA + LLANHARAN DIARY IT IS DELIVERED TO PENCOED _ LLANHARAN _BRYNNA _ COYCHURCH _ HEOL Y CYW AND TREOES THERE ARE 6000 DELIVERED EVERY MONTH.THE PEOPLE WHO PUBLISH THE DIARY ARE CALLED SUSAN+WALTER KING THEY LIVE IN LLANHARAN.THERE IS ALSO A SCHOOL MAGARZINE WHICH IS PUBLISHED BY Mrs TURNBULL WHO IS A TEACHER AT BRYNNAU SCHOOL.{By Shelley O'Connor { + {Amanda Abbott
